channel.title: [HELP]Wild Everywhere
channel.description: Hi, i have a problem. On my server ppl can kill other players everywhere...how i can change that they can attack only in wild? Plz help me!

item.title: [HELP]Wild Everywhere
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

look if u wanna make all of varrock a safe zone (non-attackble)
then go to your client java(the notepad client)

search for

public boolean nonwild

you should see something like

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}
replace all of that with this:
public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 ) || (absX >= 2768 && absX <= 2770 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 ) || (absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 2759 && absX <= 2761 && absY >=2767 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >= 3231 && absX <= 3266 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3440)||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

Read full topic
